meta.source_provenance: Email from noreply-public@digital-policing.co.uk to Ben Carter on 2024-12-13 (issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon, Sussex Police)

emails.subject_summary: Jonathan Dixon requires your assistance in a police investigation
emails.body_raw:
You have been requested by Jonathan Dixon a Police Officer or member of Police Staff*, to provide data to assist with a police investigation/enquiry.
Please click here to respond to this request.
The link to the request will expire on 27/12/2024
*This email has been issued by a member of one of the following police forces: Hampshire Constabulary; Thames Valley Police, Surrey Police or Sussex Police
Confidentiality: This communication and any attachments are intended for the above-named persons only and may be confidential and/or legally privileged. If this communication has come to you in error you must take no action based on it, nor must you copy or show it to anyone; please delete/destroy and inform the sender by e-mail immediately.
For details of force Privacy Notices, please visit the relevant website.
emails.body: Digital evidence-portal request via Digital Policing issued on behalf of PC Jonathan Dixon with expiry 27/12/2024.

sentence_tags.text: The link to the request will expire on 27/12/2024.
sentence_tags.notes: Time-limited portal link sets hard deadline.

contradiction_links.claim: Prior evidence submissions were properly retained and actioned.
contradiction_links.reality: New portal request follows earlier alleged 'lost' evidence.

contradiction_links.claim: Victim needs only submit evidence once for action.
contradiction_links.reality: Repeated requests require re-submission without accountability for earlier uploads.

events: PC Jonathan Dixon requested digital evidence via portal; expiry 27/12/2024.

damages_summary.emotional: Impersonal, institutional tone and pressure to comply.
damages_summary.strategic: Evidence loop risk: repeated portal submissions without confirmation of action.
damages_summary.reputational: Failure to act on prior evidence could be reframed as victim non-cooperation.
